name: BigBayes
body:
### Welcome

We are based at the [Department of Statistics](http://www.stats.ox.ac.uk/), [University of Oxford](http://www.ox.ac.uk/).  We work on developing novel methods for machine learning, with particular emphasis on statistical approaches to learning.

We thank the following organizations for funding:
* [Engineering and Physical Sciences Research Council](http://www.epsrc.ac.uk/)
* [European Research Council](http://erc.europa.eu/)
* [Marie Sk≈Çodowska-Curie Actions Fellowship](http://ec.europa.eu/research/mariecurieactions/)

### Group Members
* Yee Whye Teh (@ywteh)
* Francois Caron
* Dino Sejdinovic
* Sebastian Vollmer
* Pierre Jacobs
* Levi Boyles
* Konstantina Palla
* Balaji Lakshminarayanan
* Maria Lomeli
* Thibaut Lienart
* Tamara Fernandez Aguilar
* Frauke Harms
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
